DOC.brief_title: Normal Values Ano-rectal 3D High Resolution Manometry
DOC.criteria: Arm 1 : 50 healthy volunteer Inclusions stratify gender ( 10 male , 40 female ) , age ( 15 subject 40 year ; 20 subject 40 60 year ; 15 subject > 60 year ) parous ( 10 nullipara 30 parous woman ) . Inclusion criterion : Subject old 18 year Absence anorectal symptom ( constipation , fecal incontinence ) Absence pelvic floor disorder Vaizey score = 0 Kess score < 9 Subject health insurance Written inform consent Non inclusion criterion : Patient young 18 year Pregnancy Incapability give consent No write informed consent Participation another study time Previous anorectal surgery Pelvic radiotherapy Neurological disorder Diabetes mellitus Arm 2 : 50 patient fecal incontinence Inclusion criterion : Subject old 18 year Patient refer anorectal manometry and/or ultrasound examination Fecal incontinence main complain Vaizey score > 6 Kess score < 9 Subject health insurance Written inform consent Non inclusion criterion : Patient young 18 year Pregnancy Incapability give consent No write informed consent Participation another study time Rectal tumor Rectal stenosis Ileoanal ileorectal anastomosis Anal fissure Anal fistula Arm 3 : 50 patient constipation Inclusion criterion : Subject old 18 year Patient refer anorectal manometry and/or ultrasound examination Constipation main complain Feeling incomplete evacuation and/or manual disimpaction define needing press around anus aid defecation Vaizey score < 6 Kess score < 9 Subject health insurance Written inform consent Non inclusion criterion : Patient young 18 year Pregnancy Incapability give consent No write informed consent Participation another study time Rectal tumor Rectal stenosis Ileoanal ileorectal anastomosis Anal fissure Anal fistula
